Description (info box/hover text): Refer a friend to Wavefront Engage Platform by posting this link to your Wall. You will earn 5% of all of your referral's total points. That's because FanFueled's patented 'Share, Track, Reward' software tracks your influence across multiple degrees of separation and rewards you for it.
